text: The Lego Movie is an American animated movie series. There are currently four movies: The Lego Movie (2014), The Lego Batman Movie (2017), The Lego Ninjago Movie (2017) and The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part (2019). ==Movies== * The Lego Movie (2014) * The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part (2019) * The Lego Movie 3: The Third Part (TBA) ===Spin-off=== * The Lego Batman Movie (2017) * The Lego Ninjago Movie (2017) ==Televisions== * Unikitty! (2017-2020) * The Awesome Adventures of Emmet Brickowski (2025) ==Video Games== * The Lego Movie: Videogame (2014) * The Lego Ninjago Movie: Video Game (2017) * The Lego Movie 2: Videogame (2019)
title: The Lego Movie (franchise)
